column2:
df <- data.frame(
  id = 1:n,
  age = sample(18:90, n, replace = TRUE),
  sex = sample(c("M", "F", "X"), n, replace = TRUE),
  income = round(rlnorm(n, meanlog = 10, sdlog = 0.6)), # skewed income
  relationship_status = sample(c("single", "married / partnered", "divorced / widowed", "one partner", "several partners", NA), n, replace = TRUE, prob = c(0.45,0.35,0.12,0.05,0.03)),
  score = rnorm(n, 100, 15),
  date_joined = sample(seq(as.Date("2018-01-01"), as.Date("2024-12-31"), by = "day"), n, replace = TRUE),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

Error in sample.int(length(x), size, replace, prob) : 
  incorrect number of probabilities
